content:
Some core courses and concepts included in a mechanical engineering degree program are:

1. Calculus and Differential Equations
2. Physics and Mechanics
3. Materials Science and Engineering
4. Thermodynamics and Heat Transfer
5. Machine Design and Manufacturing Processes
6. Control Systems and Robotics
7. Fluid Mechanics and Aerodynamics
8. Mechanics of Solids and Structures
9. Finite Element Analysis and Computational Methods
10. Engineering Design and Project Management
